metadata.title: CVE-2019-10768 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In AngularJS before 1.7.9 the function `merge()` could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of `Object.prototype` using a `__proto__` payload.

criterions.comment: angular.js package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.9-1').
